    <section class="intro">

          <hr class="intro-line" />

            stuck filling in tedious forms.</p>

            <h3>Affordable Prices</h3>
            <p>We don’t want you worrying about high monthly costs. Our prices may be low,
            but we still offer the best coverage possible.</p>
          </div><!-- .content__cards -->
          <div class="content__cards col-lg-4">
            <img src="images/icon-people-first.svg" alt="People icon" class="content-img img-fluid">
            <h3>People First</h3>
            <p>Our plans aren’t full of conditions and clauses to prevent payouts. We make
            sure you’re covered when you need it.</p>
          </div><!-- .content__cards -->
        </div><!-- .row -->
      </div><!-- .container -->
    </section><!-- .content -->

<<<<CSS>>>>



/* Mobile Design--Default */
/* Heading Font */
@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Serif+Display&display=swap");
/* Body Font */
@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Karla:wght@400;700&display=swap");
/* Variables */
/* Primary */
/* Neutral */
* {
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
          box-sizing: border-box;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  /*outline: 1px solid black;*/
}

html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

body {
  height: 100vh;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4 {
  font-family: "DM Serif Display", serif;
}

h2 {
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 2.75rem;
  line-height: 1em;
}

h3 {
  font-weight: 400;
}

p {
  font-family: "Karla", sans-serif;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.75em;
}

img {
  display: block;
}

hr {
  background-color: #837d87;
  width: 100%;
}

/* Navigation Style */
.navbar {
  margin: auto;
  background-color: white;
}

.collapse {
  height: 600px;
  max-height: 680px;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-box-pack: space-evenly;
      -ms-flex-pack: space-evenly;
          justify-content: space-evenly;
  font-family: 700;
  background-color: #2b272f;
  -webkit-transition: background-color 600ms ease;
  transition: background-color 600ms ease;
}

.navbar-nav {
  list-style-type: none;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
}

.nav-item {
  width: 100%;
  margin: auto;
  padding: 1em;
  margin-bottom: 1em;
}

.nav-link {
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  font-family: "Karla", sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  letter-spacing: 0.1em;
  color: #ffffff;
}

.nav-link:hover {
  border-bottom: 2px solid white;
}

.nav-btn {
  height: 50px;
  width: 80% !important;
  border: 2px solid white;
  color: white;
  margin: 2em 0;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 400;
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.navbar-brand,
.navbar-toggler {
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.navbar-toggler > .close {
  display: none;
}

.navbar-toggler .collapsed > .open,
.navbar-toggler:not(.collapsed) > .close {
  display: inline;
}

.navbar-toggler .collapsed > .close,
.navbar-toggler:not(.collapsed) > .open {
  display: none;
}

.navbar-brand,
.navbar-toggler {
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.nav-pattern {
  width: 100%;
  height: 200px;
  bottom: -12em;
  background-image: url("/images/bg-pattern-mobile-nav.svg");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
}

/* Intro Style */
.intro {
  margin: auto;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  background: #2d2640;
  position: relative;
}

.intro-line {
  display: none;
}

.intro__image {
  width: 100%;
}

.intro__info {
  width: 90%;
  margin: auto;
  padding: 6em 0;
  text-align: center;
  color: white;
}

.intro__title {
  font-size: 50px;
  margin-bottom: 0.4em;
}

.intro__paragraph {
  margin-bottom: 2em;
}

.intro-btn, .cta-btn {
  width: 50% !important;
  margin: auto;
  font-family: "Karla", sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.1em;
  padding: 0.75em 2em;
}

.intro-btn:hover, .cta-btn:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  color: #2b272f;
  background-color: #ffffff;
}

.intro__container {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  position: relative;
}

.intro__pattern {
  position: absolute;
  width: 8em;
}

.intro-pattern-rt {
  bottom: -12em;
  right: 0;
}

.intro-pattern-lf {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
}

.desktop {
  display: none;
  visibility: hidden;
}

/* Content Styling */
.content__container {
  width: 90%;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  margin: auto;
}

.content-line {
  margin-top: 10em;
  width: 10em;
  background-color: #837d87;
}

.content__container h2 {
  font-size: 50px;
  margin: 1em 0 2em 0;
  color: #2b272f;
}

.content__cards {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 4.5em;
}

.content__cards p {
  color: #837d87;
}

.content-img {
  margin-bottom: 2.25em;
}

/* CTA Style */
.cta {
  width: 90%;
  margin: 4em auto 9em auto;
  padding: 4.5em 0;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  text-align: center;
  background-color: #2d2640;
  color: #ffffff;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  overflow: hidden;
  background-image: url("/images/bg-pattern-how-we-work-mobile.svg");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: 100% 0;
}

.cta-title {
  font-size: 50px;
  margin-bottom: 1em;
  padding: 0 0.5em;
}

/* Footer */
.container-fluid {
  width: 90%;
  margin: 5em auto 3em auto;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  background-color: #fafafa;
  background-image: url("/images/bg-pattern-footer-mobile.svg");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: contain;
}

.footer__header {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  margin: 3em auto 0;
  /*border-bottom: 2px solid $dk-grayish-violet;*/
}

.footer__header .logo {
  margin: auto;
}

.footer__header .social {
  margin: 1.5em 0 2em 0;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
}

.footer__header .social-icons {
  margin: 0 0.5em;
}

.footer__header .social-icons:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  -webkit-filter: brightness(0);
          filter: brightness(0);
}

.footer__content-container {
  width: 100%;
  margin-top: 2em;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  text-align: center;
}

.footer__links {
  width: 100%;
}

.footer__links ul {
  list-style-type: none;
  margin-bottom: 2em;
}

.ft__link-title, .ft-links {
  margin-bottom: 1.5em;
  font-family: "Karla", sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: #837d87;
}

.ft-link-item {
  font-family: "Karla", sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  margin-bottom: 0.25em;
}

.ft-links {
  color: black;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.ft-links:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.attribution {
  font-size: 11px;
  text-align: center;
  background-color: #fafafa;
}

.attribution a {
  color: #3e52a3;
}

/* Media Queries */
/* Tablet */
@media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
  .collapse {
    height: 640px;
    max-height: 680px;
  }
  .nav-pattern {
    bottom: -15em;
  }
  .content__cards p {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
  }
  .ft__link-title, .ft-links {
    font-size: 1rem;
  }
}

/* Desktop */
@media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
  /* Navigation */
  .navbar {
    z-index: 0;
    padding: 0.5em 2em;
  }
  .collapse {
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    margin-right: 40px;
    background: none;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    -webkit-box-pack: end;
        -ms-flex-pack: end;
            justify-content: flex-end;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
        -ms-flex-align: center;
            align-items: center;
  }
  .navbar-nav {
    margin-right: 20px !important;
  }
  .navbar-brand {
    margin: 0 40px;
  }
  .nav-item {
    width: auto;
    margin: 0 0.75em;
  }
  .nav-link {
    font-size: 1em;
    color: #837d87;
  }
  .nav-link:hover {
    color: #2d2640;
  }
  .nav-btn {
    width: 150px !important;
    font-size: 0.85em !important;
    margin-right: 2em;
    color: #2d2640 !important;
    border: 2px solid #2d2640 !important;
  }
  .nav-btn:hover {
    background-color: #2d2640 !important;
    color: white !important;
  }
  .nav-pattern {
    display: none;
  }
  /* Intro */
  .intro {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    -webkit-box-pack: justify;
        -ms-flex-pack: justify;
            justify-content: space-between;
  }
  .mobile {
    display: none;
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  .desktop {
    display: initial;
    visibility: visible;
  }
  .intro {
    position: relative;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: reverse;
        -ms-flex-direction: row-reverse;
            flex-direction: row-reverse;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
        -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
    -webkit-box-align: start;
        -ms-flex-align: start;
            align-items: flex-start;
    padding-top: 2em;
  }
  .intro__image {
    position: relative;
    top: 6em;
    width: 40%;
  }
  .intro__container {
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
    -webkit-box-pack: start;
        -ms-flex-pack: start;
            justify-content: flex-start;
    padding-top: 4em;
    margin-right: 2em;
  }
  .intro-line {
    width: 150px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    display: inherit;
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #837d87;
  }
  .intro__info {
    padding-top: 4em;
    max-width: 640px;
    text-align: left;
    width: 94%;
  }
  .intro__title {
    width: 90%;
  }
  .intro__paragraph {
    margin-bottom: 3em;
  }
  .intro__pattern {
    width: auto;
  }
  .intro-pattern-lf {
    bottom: -22em;
    top: initial;
  }
  .intro-pattern-rt {
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    bottom: initial;
  }
  /* Content */
  .content {
    margin-bottom: 6em;
  }
  .content__container {
    margin: auto;
    -webkit-box-align: start;
        -ms-flex-align: start;
            align-items: flex-start;
    max-width: 1280px;
    width: 90%;
    padding: 0 2em;
    margin-top: 8em;
    margin-bottom: 6em;
  }
  .content__title {
    margin-top: 1.25em;
    margin-bottom: 1.5em;
  }
  .content__cards {
    -webkit-box-align: start;
        -ms-flex-align: start;
            align-items: flex-start;
    text-align: left;
    width: 32%;
  }
  /* CTA */
  .cta {
    max-width: 1216px;
    margin-top: 3em;
    margin-bottom: 6em;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
        -ms-flex-align: center;
            align-items: center;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
        -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
    background-image: url("/images/bg-pattern-how-we-work-desktop.svg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: 100% 0%;
  }
  .cta__find-more {
    width: 100%;
    margin: auto;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
        -ms-flex-align: center;
            align-items: center;
    -webkit-box-pack: justify;
        -ms-flex-pack: justify;
            justify-content: space-between;
    text-align: left;
  }
  .cta-title {
    font-size: 2.5em;
    margin: auto;
    width: 50%;
  }
  .cta-btn {
    width: 200px !important;
  }
  /* Footer */
  .container-fluid {
    width: 90%;
    max-width: 1440px;
    margin-top: 2em;
    padding: 0 3em;
    background-image: url("/images/bg-pattern-footer-desktop.svg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: contain;
  }
  .footer__header {
    width: 80% !important;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    -webkit-box-pack: justify;
        -ms-flex-pack: justify;
            justify-content: space-between;
  }
  .footer-line {
    width: 80%;
  }
  .footer__content-container {
    width: 80%;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    -webkit-box-align: start;
        -ms-flex-align: start;
            align-items: flex-start;
    -webkit-box-pack: justify;
        -ms-flex-pack: justify;
            justify-content: space-between;
    margin-top: 1em;
  }
  .footer__links {
    text-align: left;
    width: 25%;
  }
  .ft__link-title, .ft-links {
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    letter-spacing: 0.1em;
    margin-bottom: 2.5em;
  }
  .ft-link-item {
    margin-bottom: 0.65em;
  }
}
